ComicInfo.Summary:
Hellchild is back in a brand new series!
Angelica Blackstone is half-vampire, half-god, and she has a hell of a lot of aggression to work out. Hellchild: The Unholy is a roller coaster ride through the horror that dwells under society. From human sacrifice to reptilian gods to the dark and demonic powers hiding within seemingly everyday people, join the team that brought you Robyn Hood and Van Helsing for the darkest hero in the Grimm Universe!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|--------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Sheldon Goh & Sanju Nivangune | Missing | | B | Cover B | Larry Watts & Ulises Grostieta | Missing | | C | Cover C | Mike Krome & Ula Mos | Missing | | D | Cover D | Sean Hill & Fran Gamboa | Missing | | E | Alamo City Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | Mike DeBalfo, Jeremy Clark & Sanju Nivangune | Missing | | F | Cosplay Exclusive Cover, Limited to 350 | Jamie Tyndall & Ula Mos | Missing | | G | Red Carpet Secret Exclusive Cover | Richard Ortiz & Victor Bartlett | Missing |
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter One: Invisible People
